channel.title: My players still attack each other even if they are 10 lvls apart in lvl 1 wild

item.title: My players still attack each other even if they are 10 lvls apart in lvl 1 wild
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

What’s the problem with this code?

client plz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; if(!nonWild() && !plz.nonWild() && plz != null) { if (InWildrange = true) { IsAttacking = true; inCombat(); } } else { sendMessage("This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked"); } if (InWildrange = false) { sendMessage("You must move deeper into the Wilderness to attack this player."); }

It compiles fine but I can still attack whoever in the wild, it doesn’t matter what level

Read full topic
item.source: My players still attack each other even if they are 10 lvls apart in lvl 1 wild
